resources.string: Your rewiring journey ended after %1$d rewirings on %2$s. Next time you will make it longer!

Every day, you can rewire one of your brain cells by coloring it.

Can you make it to the end? This is perfect if you want to quit an addiction or achieve your goals! Let’s start! Watching your progress as you rewire your brain is really motivating—trust me!

Just click on an empty brain cell each day and color it in.

Let’s go—start today!

string-array.name: ranks
string-array.item: Initiate – Just getting started; shows potential.
Apprentice – Learning and growing; dedicated effort.
Champion – Stands out among peers; achieves notable success.
Master – Commands respect through refined skill.
Sage – Wise and insightful; often a guide to others.
Deity – Elevated beyond human limits; inspires awe.
